mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(out_date,'%y-%M') yearMonth ,SUM(o.out_amt*p.PRICE) totalPrice ,(SUM(o.out_amt*p.PRICE))*0.4 totalIncome FROM outbound o JOIN product p on o.product_id = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE o.status = 'Y' GROUP BY yearMonth;

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NAME ,SUM(o.out_amt*p.PRICE) totalPrice ,(SUM(o.out_amt*p.PRICE))*0.4 totalIncome FROM outbound o LEFT JOIN product p on o.product_id = p.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN product_temp t on p.PRODUCT_NAME = t.product_name WHERE o.status = 'Y' AND t.company_name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{ companyName }, '%') GROUP BY p.PRODUCT_NAME;
